KtbsUtils

Method Detail

hasReservedNamespace

public static boolean hasReservedNamespace(String pName)
Tell if a given property name is defined is a namespace reserved by the KTBS.

Reserved namespaces are:

  • http://liris.cnrs.fr/silex/2009/ktbs#
  • http://blablabla/rdf#
  • http://blablabla/rdfs#

The purpose of forbidding the entire namespaces rdf anb rdfs (while only rdf:type and rdfs:label are reserved by the KTBS) is to draw the border between triples that are interpreted as relations between obsel and triples interpreted as simple resource properties.

Parameters:
pName -
Returns:

getJavaClass

public static Class<? extends KtbsResource> getJavaClass(String rdfType)
Give the Java class that is used to create new instances of a KTBS resource of given rdf type.

Parameters:
rdfType - the value of the rdf:type property of the KTBS resource
Returns:
the Java class that is associated to that rdf type, null if the rdf type does not defined a KTBS resource

getParentResource

public static String getParentResource(KtbsResource resource)
Resolves the URI of the parent resource of a Ktbs resource.

Parameters:
resource - the child resource whose parent resource URI is to be resolved
Returns:
the URI of the parent resource of this resource, null if no parent URI could be resolved TODO implements this method the proper way, i.e. by getting the parent URI of the resource from the resource itself.

addAspect

public static String addAspect(String resourceURI,
                               String aspect,
                               String... alternatives)
Builds a URI with a specified Ktbs resource aspect (e.g. @obsels and @about for a ktbs:StoredTrace or a ktbs:ComputedTrace) at the end of the URI, whatever the aspect suffix was before calling this method.

Parameters:
resourceURI - the input resource URI
aspect - the aspect suffix, null if no aspect suffix wanted
alternatives - the other aspect suffixes that the resource could have had
Returns:
the resource URI, with the desired aspect suffix

Parameters:
c - the input collection of KTBS resources

the collection of resource uris
